designations.source: Review of the status of charophytes (stoneworts) - N Stewart (unpublished)
designations.source_description: The charophytes, or stoneworts, form a class of the green algae. They have recently been assessed by N Stewart, using the current IUCN criteria, a publication will appear shortly.
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: A taxon is Vulnerable when it is not Critically Endangered or Endangered but is facing a high risk of extinction in the wild in the medium term future.
